1.
b) 
>> A = [1 -1.4 (-1.4)^2 (-1.4)^3 (-1.4)^4; 
1 -1 (-1)^2 (-1)^3 (-1)^4;
1 0.1 (0.1)^2 (0.1)^3 (0.1)^4;
1 1.1 (1.1)^2 1.1^3 1.1^4;
1 1.4 1.4^2 1.4^3 1.4^4] 

A =

    1.0000   -1.4000    1.9600   -2.7440    3.8416
    1.0000   -1.0000    1.0000   -1.0000    1.0000
    1.0000    0.1000    0.0100    0.0010    0.0001
    1.0000    1.1000    1.2100    1.3310    1.4641
    1.0000    1.4000    1.9600    2.7440    3.8416

>> b = [tan(-1.4);
tan(-1);
tan(1);
tan 
>> b = [tan(-1.4);
tan(-1);       
tan(0.1);      
tan(1.1);
tan(1.4)]

b =

   -5.7979
   -1.5574
    0.1003
    1.9648
    5.7979

>> A \ b

ans =

    0.2582
   -1.5295
   -0.7852
    2.8933
    0.3334
    
3. 
>> A = [2 3 -4 1;
1 -1 0 -2;
3 3 4 3;
4 1 0 4]

A =

     2     3    -4     1
     1    -1     0    -2
     3     3     4     3
     4     1     0     4

>> b = [13;
-5

>> b = [13; 
-5;
4;
16]

b =

    13
    -5
     4
    16

>> A \ b

ans =

     1
     0
    -2
     3
     
4.
a)
>> format long       
>> A = invhilb(5)

A =

          25        -300        1050       -1400         630
        -300        4800      -18900       26880      -12600
        1050      -18900       79380     -117600       56700
       -1400       26880     -117600      179200      -88200
         630      -12600       56700      -88200       44100

b)
>> A = hilb(5)    

A =

  Columns 1 through 4

   1.000000000000000   0.500000000000000   0.333333333333333   0.250000000000000
   0.500000000000000   0.333333333333333   0.250000000000000   0.200000000000000

   0.200000000000000
   0.166666666666667
   0.142857142857143
   0.125000000000000
   0.111111111111111


>> b = [0;0;0;0;1]

b =

     0
     0
     0
     0
     1

>> A \ b          

ans =

   1.0e+04 *

   0.062999999999773

  -8.819999999972815
   4.409999999986752

c)
>> inv(hilb(5))

ans =

   1.0e+05 *

  Columns 1 through 4

   0.000250000000000  -0.002999999999998   0.010499999999993  -0.013999999999990
  -0.002999999999998   0.047999999999970  -0.188999999999882   0.268799999999833

  -0.125999999999921
   0.566999999999695
  -0.881999999999575
   0.440999999999805

d) 
>> cond(hilb(5))

ans =

     4.766072502417230e+05
     
e)
>> H = chop(hilb(5), 4)

H =

  Columns 1 through 4

   1.000000000000000   0.500000000000000   0.333300000000000   0.250000000000000
   0.500000000000000   0.333300000000000   0.250000000000000   0.200000000000000
   0.333300000000000   0.250000000000000   0.200000000000000   0.166700000000000
   0.250000000000000   0.200000000000000   0.166700000000000   0.142900000000000
   0.200000000000000   0.166700000000000   0.142900000000000   0.125000000000000

  Column 5

   0.200000000000000
   0.166700000000000
   0.142900000000000
   0.125000000000000
   0.111100000000000

>> H \ b

ans =

   1.0e+04 *

   0.021986886920322
  -0.363061390491466
   1.478512775954861
  -2.166688318670589
   1.042137898836517
